meanings.sent1: The sponge is absorbable and can soak up water easily.
meanings.sent2: The paper towel is absorbable, making it great for cleaning up spills.
meanings.sent3: The absorbable sponge was so thirsty, it drank up all the spilled juice!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like an absorbable sponge, soaking in all the knowledge around her.
meanings.sent5: The absorbable fabric quickly absorbed the spilled coffee, leaving no stain behind.

meanings.definition: Able to be soaked up or taken in.
meanings.sent1: The soil in the garden is absorbable, allowing the plants to take in water.
meanings.sent2: The paper towel is absorbable, making it perfect for wiping up messes.
meanings.sent3: The absorbable soil seemed to gulp down the rain as if it was thirsty.
meanings.sent4: Her absorbable mind soaked in the beauty of the sunset like a sponge.
meanings.sent5: The absorbable cotton fabric quickly soaked up the spilled milk, leaving the table dry.
